title: Road
lyrics:
Lookin' through a dark lens
I've been playin' pretend too long
Please don't tell our new friends
Sometimes I would rather be alone
With you, with you

I'd rather be alone

With you, with you



Whoa, this time, this time

Don't scream before you leave

This time, this time

I won't talk before I breathe



Oh-oh, oh-oh

Drivin' down the [?]

Just sittin' right by my side and we go

Oh-oh, oh-oh

If I can be between heaven and hell

Baby I'd choose the road

Oh-oh, oh-oh

Oh-oh, oh

I'd choose the road

Oh-oh, oh-oh

I'd choose the road



Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh



Starin' at your comments

In the livin' room we slow dance

You told me I'm a bitter man

I'm just searchin' for that balance



This time

I think of what I did

Oh-oh-oh, this time

I won't take more than I give



Oh-oh, oh-oh

Drivin' down the [?]

Just sittin' right by my side and we go

Oh-oh, oh-oh

If I can be between heaven and hell

Oh baby I'd choose the road

Oh-oh, oh-oh

Oh-oh, oh

I'd choose the road

Oh-oh, oh-oh

I'd choose the road



Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh-oh

Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

I'd choose the road

I'd choose the ro-oad



Heaven's on the road

Keep it close now, we've just begun

I swear that I can feel

Every emotion there is all at once



Heaven's on the road

Keep it close now, we've just begun

I swear that I can feel

Every emotion there is all at once



Heaven's on the road

Keep it close now, we've just begun

I swear that I can feel

Every emotion there is all at once



Heaven's on the road

Keep it close now, we've just begun

I swear that I can feel

Every emotion there is all at once
